Name: Clinozoisite Ca_2Al_3(SiO_4)_3(OH)
Type: Mineral
Class: Silicates
Subclass: Sorosilicate
Particle Size: 45-125um
Sample No.: SS-4A
Owner: JPL
Wavelength Range: VNIR-SWIR
Origin: Mexico, Sonora
Collected by Ward's
Description: 





Measurement: Hemispherical reflectance
First Column: X
Second Column: Y
X Units:  Wavelength (micrometers)
Y Units:  Reflectance (percent)
First X Value:   0.40
Last X Value:   2.50
Number of X Values:  826
Additional Information: ss04aa.txt
